pros: Great hands-on experience. Lots of responsibility early on. Amazing policy work that can be done.
cons: Limited on-boarding from most national governments. You have to figure out on your own how to achieve highest policy impact. It can be demanding to settle in in a very different culture and perform well in only 2 years.

review_title: Great opportunity for working in International Development
pros: Unmatched insider perspective into developing country governments.
cons: Too much depends on supervisor - responsibilities, output, feedback.
